oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1960-08-13 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from August 13, 1960. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), the Wilburn Brothers (host/performer), guest performer Charlie Walker, and regular performers Archie Campbell, Tommy Vaden, the Jordanaires, Chet Atkins, June Carter, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1088th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Wilburn Brothers; Archie Campbell; Charlie Walker; Tommy Vaden; Jordanaires; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces the Wilburn Brothers -- The Big Heartbreak (Wilburn Brothers) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner) -- The Wilburn Brothers introduce Archie Campbell -- Comedy routine (Archie Campbell, Wilburn Brothers) -- Grant Turner and the Wilburn Brothers introduce Charlie Walker -- Who Will Buy The Wine (Charlie Walker) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Wilburn Brothers) -- The Wilburn Brothers introduce Tommy Vaden -- Old Joe Clark (Tommy Vaden fiddle) -- Grant Turner and Doyle Wilburn talk -- When The Roll Is Called Up Yonder (Wilburn Brothers, Jordanaires) -- The Wilburn Brothers introduce Chet Atkins -- Listen To The Mockingbird (Chet Atkins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Sloan, Ralph; Tennessee Travelers; Vaden, Tommy; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Jordanaires (Musical group); Campbell, Archie; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Wilburn Brothers; Wilburn, Teddy; Wilburn, Doyle; Walker, Charlie, 1926-2008; Husky, Ferlin
